import React, { useState, useReducer } from 'react'; import TotalDisplay from './components/TotalDisplay'; import CalcButton from './components/CalcButton'; import index from "./actions/index"; import reducerIndex, { initialState } from "./reducers/index"; function App() { const [state, dispatch] = useReducer(reducerIndex, initialState); function handleArttir() { dispatch({ type: "ADD_ONE" }); } function ApplyNumber() { dispatch({ type: "APPLY_NUMBER" }) } function ChangeOperation() { dispatch({ type: "CHANGE_OPERATION" }) } return (

); } export default App;
